summary: 2002 INFINITI QX4. CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO RECALL CONCERNING SIDE STRUT TOWER HOUSING *TGW  THE CONSUMER STATED HE WAS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT, BECAUSE OF THE FAILED PART. HE IS SEEKING REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE REPAIRS. *JB  THE CONSUMER STATED THE REPAIRS WERE COMPLETED PRIOR TO HIM BEING AWARE OF THE RECALL.  UPDATED 12/06/11
